description: This file contains test cases for the SQLite template in a project involving project initialization, configuration, and database setup. It leverages pytest fixtures and tests various functionalities like content replacement, database creation, and execution of scripts in a SQLite database context.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture that creates and cleans up a temporary directory for tests.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a mock SQLite template directory with configuration and script files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a sample project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_sqlite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that retrieves initialization info from the SQLite template and validates its contents.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the full process of project creation and verifies key files and content.

methods.name: test_database_creation(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Runs the generated init_db.py script to create the SQLite database and verifies its structure and data.

methods.name: test_default_database_name(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks the default database name generated when not explicitly provided in parameters.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that the post-processing script executes, creating marker files as expected.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests loading a project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that template variables in files are correctly replaced with actual parameters.

methods.name: test_sqlite_specific_features(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks features specific to SQLite, like absence of authentication parameters.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Confirms that the entry point URL is correctly constructed with project parameters.
